attributes.action: Hold a second referendum in light of "Leave" reneging on the NHS £ 350m pledge.
attributes.additional_details: The media has also featured many stories of "Leave" voters actually appalled that they won. They only wished to lodge a protest vote. They also need the opportunity to reconsider their position.
attributes.background: I was astounded that Nigel Farage stated that the pledge, written large on their campaign bus, was a "mistake". Hundreds of thousands of people almost certainly voted out on the basis that this money would be spent on the NHS. They need to be allowed to vote again.
